Welcome to Surfsup

West Cork's finest Surf School

Surf'sup Surf school is the perfect place to catch waves on Ireland’s Wild Atlantic Way. From first-time surfers to families and improvers, our qualified instructors provide safe, fun lessons with top-quality equipment. Enjoy stunning beaches, exciting activities, and unforgettable surf experiences for all ages and abilities.

What we offer

Adult Surf lessons

Learn the basics or improve your skills in fun, safe sessions.

more info
Kids Surf Camp

Fun-filled surfing adventures for children aged 7+, with safety first.

more info
Private lessons

Personalised coaching to boost confidence, skills, and surf faster.

more info
Stand-Up Paddle Board

Explore West Cork’s coastline with relaxing, beginner-friendly paddle boarding.

more info
